Title: Night of the Living Dead
Writer: John A. Russo (screenplay), George A. Romero (screenplay)
Actors: Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea, Karl Hardman, Marilyn Eastman
Plot: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.
Production: Off Color Films, Image Ten, Market Square Productions, Laurel
